name: Vampire Troll Princess Paisni
description:
Paisni, a Homestuck troll Vampire Princess, has been teleported to a weird universe where all sorts of media are together! Things are WACKY!!!!

Game features:

  • 30min-1hour gameplay, depending on how you do it
  • Multiple recognizable characters and one Homestuck OC
  • Very Anime
  • Soundtrack is just a bunch of obscurish anime songs I like
  • I guess it's fun? It's more annoying than fun but that's by design so I'm considering that a plus
  • SO META AND WACKY XD
  • Honest to God my last RPG, this time for realsies
